text_block_list.name: Bitter Glasse
text_block_list.text:
Oh, there you are! Good work! I
wanted to talk to you!

text_block_list.name: Bitter Glasse
text_block_list.text: That was a good run! Gave me the chills.

text_block_list.name: Bitter Glasse
text_block_list.text:
I look forward to fighting with you guys
again! See you in the "Aoharu Hai"!

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text:
… Like she said… Uhh, well… that wasn't
bad.

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text:
… I'm not trying to comfort
you or anything. Really.
